Watch your step

This web page is currently under construction. You can help by going to GitHub and making a pull request to edit this page.

Go to GitHub ›

Unity, in Plasma

Enjade Core is the new, innovative desktop environment that continues the legacy of Unity 7. Built upon the work of Plasma, Core brings new features and support for modern technologies like Wayland and universal search.

View on GitHub

“ Noble ambitions that give ardent Unity admirers an alternative to the official Compiz version. ”

Joey Sheddon, OMG! Ubuntu - Enjade Wants to Recreate the Unity Desktop on KDE Plasma
